name: Weave: Maze Generator
description:
Tap the left side of the screen to bring up the menu

Generate: begins generating a maze with the current settings.

Solve: tap to begin solving the maze.

Maze width: adjusts how many 'cells' wide the maze is.

Maze height: adjusts how many 'cells' high the maze is.

Complex: check to make the maze more complex by adding an extra layer for paths to be drawn above and below the usual three layers.

Maze generation speed: adjusts how fast the maze gets drawn. A setting of 15 will draw the maze all in one go and may cause the program to freeze temporarily on large mazes.

Save, Load and Quit: Does not work on web

Advanced: opens the advanced options tab.
